definitions.text: the noise made by a short puff of steam (as from an engine)
(usually in the plural) a garment extending from the waist to the knee or ankle, covering each leg separately
examples: he had a sharp crease in his trousers

definitions.text: a short labored intake of breath with the mouth open
examples: she gave a gasp and fainted

definitions.text: breathe noisily, as when one is exhausted
examples: The runners reached the finish line, panting heavily

definitions.text: utter while panting, as if out of breath
